abstract: China has told some banks to limit lending and will restrict overall credit growth in the nation to $1.1 trillion this year, banking regulator Liu Mingkang said.
snippet: China has told some banks to limit lending and will restrict overall credit growth in the nation to $1.1 trillion this year, banking regulator Liu Mingkang said.
lead_paragraph: China has told some banks to limit lending and will restrict overall credit growth in the nation to 7.5 trillion renminbi ($1.1 trillion) this year, said the banking regulator, Liu Mingkang.

headline.main: China Orders Some Banks to Rein in Loans
